steps.action: Set viewport size to width 1080 and height 1440
Visit URL assigned to variable "app.url"
Enter "aso_marketplace@elililly.onmicrosoft.com" in the "someone@example.com" text field
Click on the button with ID "idSIButton9"
Click on the "Enter the password for aso_marketplace@elililly.onmicrosoft.com" text field
Enter a password in the "Enter the password for aso_marketplace@elililly.onmicrosoft.com" text field
Click on the button with ID "idSIButton9"
Click on the <svg> element with text "CaretDown"
Click on the <span> element with text "Intelligent Automation"
Click on the <svg> element with text "CaretDown"
Click on the <span> element with text "Test Automation"
Click on the <svg> element with text "CaretDown"
Click on the <span> element with text "Document Processing"
Click on the <svg> element with text "CaretDown"
Click on the <span> element with text "Content Automation"
Click on a <path> element
Click on the <span> element with text "Process Optimization"
Click on the <span> element with text "Marketplace"
Click on the <span> element with text "TechZone"
Click on the <span> element with text "Home"
Assert "alt" of the element with class name "logo-responsive" equals "Brand Logo"
